briefTitle: Comparison Trial of Letrozole to Anastrozole in the Adjuvant Treatment of Postmenopausal Women With Hormone Receptor and Node Positive Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Comparison Trial of Letrozole to Anastrozole in the Adjuvant Treatment of Postmenopausal Women With Hormone Receptor and Node Positive Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Recent primary surgery for breast cancer
* Early stage breast cancer
* Postmenopausal
* Hormone receptor positive
* Positive lymph node involvement

Exclusion Criteria:

* Metastatic disease
* Presence of contralateral breast cancer including DCIS
* Progression

Other protocol-defined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
